content: संततिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Stretching across, spreading along. {@--2@} Extent, expanse, extension. {@--3@} Continuous line or flow, series, row, range, succession, continuity; चिंतासंततितंतुजालनिबिडस्यूतेव लग्ना प्रिया <ls>Māl. 5. 10</ls>; कुसुमसंततिसंततसंगिभिः <ls>Śi. 6. 36.</ls> {@--4@} Perpetuation, uninterrupted continuance; निदानमिक्ष्वाकुकुलस्य संततेः <ls>R. 3. 1.</ls> {@--5@} A race, lineage, family. {@--6@} Offspring, progeny; सततिः शुद्धवंश्या हि परत्रेह च शर्मणे <ls>R. 1. 69.</ls> {@--7@} A heap, mass; (अलं) सहसा संतीतमंहसां विहंतुं <ls>Ki. 5. 17.</ls>
